formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SpeechDeactivateGrammar' =-
[Synopsis] Deactivate a Grammar
[Description] SpeechDeactivateGrammar(Grammar Name) This deactivates the specified grammar so that it is no longer recognized. The only argument is the grammar name to deactivate.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,6 @@ Deactivate a Grammar
[Description] - SpeechDeactivateGrammar(Grammar Name) - This deactivates the specified grammar so that it is no longer recognized. The only argument is the grammar name to deactivate. + SpeechDeactivateGrammar(Grammar Name): + This deactivates the specified grammar so that it is no longer recognized. + The only argument is the grammar name to deactivate.
